Text.val: 12.10.2012 SH SCR17574 Changed Blob Ansi to Unicode blob (FCMT)
29.05.2012 JH SCR17269 Added update of new fields FCMH_ADMNO, FCMH_CLNTNO and FCMH_DEBH_NO
06.08.2011 GB SCR16669 Changed condition of selection from ..BTPC_STATUS = 4 to
22.03.2009 GB SCR14448 Changed condition for Selection
28.11.2008 GB SCR14170 Changed update FI16_DOCAMT, FI16_CHARGEBACKREASSAMT
28.11.2008 GB SCR14165 Changed update FM16_MSGTYPE, FI16_DOCTYPE
27.11.2008 GB SCR14161 Extended condition for select BATCH_PAYMENT_CLIENT rows

SQL_STMT_U.val: select BTPC.BTPC_BTCH_ID, BTPC.BTPC_BTCP_LINENO, BTPC.BTPC_LINENO, BTPC.BTPC_ADMNO, BTPC.BTPC_CLNTNO, BTPC.BTPC_DEBH, BTPC.BTPC_AMOUNTCURRC, BTPC.BTPC_DATCASHREPORT, BTPC.BTPC_DATVALUECLIENT from :1/CLNT CLNT, :1/BTPC BTPC where CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO = BTPC.BTPC_ADMNO and CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO = BTPC.BTPC_CLNTNO and CLNT.CLNT212_FCI = 2 and BTPC.BTPC_DATCASHREPORT = ':2' and BTPC.BTPC_STATUS >= 3 and BTPC.BTPC_DEBC_NO > 0 and BTPC.BTPC_FCI_FM16_NO = 0 and exists( select * from :1/BPIV BPIV where BPIV.BPIV_BTCH_ID = BTPC.BTPC_BTCH_ID and BPIV.BPIV_BTCP_LINENO = BTPC.BTPC_BTCP_LINENO and BPIV.BPIV_BTPC_LINENO = BTPC.BTPC_LINENO and BPIV.BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC <> 0 and BPIV.BPIV_PAYMENTCODE > 0 and BPIV.BPIV_PAYMENTCODE = :3) for fetch only

Text.val: If the FI16 row is stored then set FM16_TOTAMT
